core:name.text: White Ankle Socks with Ruffled Edges

core:description.text: Simple white cotton ankle socks elevated by delicate ruffles edging the cuff. The cotton blend wicks moisture while remaining soft against the skin, and the ruffled detail adds a playful, feminine touch to an everyday essential. Perfect for wearing with sneakers or around the house.
